With the declining approval numbers for the Jedi order, Chancellor Palpatine talked several female Jedi masters, knights and padawans to do a photo shoot to boost their numbers.

What the Jedi don't know, is that the photographer have special equipment to hypnotise the Jedi. To transform them from proud warriors to shameless sex slaves ?
123.title: Hypnosis Fetish

1231.title: Yes

12311.content:
Ahsoka was nervous as she took the turbo lift to the studio. She sighed, she really didn't want to to be doin this but right now the Order's approval number where in a free fall. So Chancellor Palpatine some how talked the Order into having several of their female members into doing a photo shoot to help boost their number.

Ahsoka didn't know how that would help, but Master signed her up first. He trusted the Chancellor, so he told her just to go with it.

She hoped Barriss will be over soon, she would like a friend to be with her for this.

Reached the floor with the studio, she sighed as she made her to the studio. She used the door bell, and soon it opened.

Ahsoka gulped, at seeing a young male Zeltron. He had short purple hair and red eyes. She was handsome, well what Zelteon isn't. He was dress in a simple black suit.

" Miss Tano, welcome. Please come in." Said the Zeltron, she did.

She saw a few different backgrounds and several ranks of clothing.

" Don't be nervous, you're a very attractive young Togruta. The public is going to love you." Said the Zeltron, with a smile.

Ahsoka just bluhed, " So how does go ?" Asked Ahsoka, she had no clue what to do for a photo shoot.

" Don't worry, first just stand order there." Said the Zeltron, as he pointed to a background of the temple.

Ahsoka nodded, as she walked over and stood in front of it.

He pulled out a camera and started takimg photos of her.

info.brief_description: When the Force gives a Jedi/Sith incredible powers, the results can be unpredictable...
info.description:
Hey, welcome to Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Competition. The first thing to not about this interactive is that it is split into two sections. The first is for entirely regular Star Wars stories, what would actually happen if one side or the other was given great power. The second is for slightly less scrupulous stories about the implication of one or more Star Wars characters suddenly having the universe as a plaything, and some of the more inappropriate implications.
PLEASE MAKE SURE TO KEEP THESE SECTIONS SEPARATE. DO NOT POST 18+ MATERIAL IN THE STORIED SECTION, AND DON' TURN THE 18+ SECTION INTO A KID'S STORY.

Now that that's out of the way, here's more specific rules for each section
STORIED SECTION
1.Try to avoid extremely graphic descriptions of violence
2. Try not to derail characters too badly, AKA have Ahsoka turn to the Dark Side

18+ plus section
1. Try to avoid excessive foul language.
2.While sexual content and fetish content are the primary reasons for the section, try to avoid including toilet content. Just personal preference on my part

Other than that, have fun!
info.pretty_title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Competition
